TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
but the file has Virus and don't let u open it

i wish for C-19 to disappear

Granted, but it all comes back one second later.

I wish I had my own computer

Granted, it’s a literal potato.

I wish to gain all knowledge of blender and automaticity know how to use it in its entirety.

Granted, Just read the instruction. It's usually printed on the box.

I wish for a spherical cube.

Granted but the extra dimensions required to create it become unstable and collapse in on itself creating a 500 kT explosion.

 

Wished I made more money.

Congratulations! You've completely devalued the Stonk™ and now your extra money is worthless.

 

I wish to live on Dres.

Granted, but Dres doesn’t exist.

I wish to live on Duna  Mars

Granted.

But you choke and gag when you realize air is not breathable on Duna Mars.

 

Wished forums worked better on phones.

Granted. You have to phone the telephone company, dictate your message to the maid, wait a minute, and listen while she reads the web text on the telegraph. Now it's twice faster, because earlier they were sending a courier.

53 minutes ago, Dientus said:

Wished I made more money.

Granted. You have bought a new cartridge for the  printer.

 

I wish the cartridge is of the proper color.

Granted, there I 0.5ml inside.

I wish to know how the default cube was created in blender

Granted, but I won’t tell you.

I wish I had moar stuffed animals

Granted.

But they are stuffed with thorns and rocks.

 

Wish the money I printed look more real.

Granted, you try to buy a Demag AC 395 with the counterfeit money, but even though it is still looks real, it was not real enough, so you go to prison for 20 years. Luckily, you got your phone call, called me, and I busted you out in my G-BKF armored rescue crane. Then they caught you again, and went away for 25. I got the Hypnotoad (Only Futurama fans will understand) as my lawyer, so I was deemed not guilty.

I wish for a full size Lego Sarens SGC-250 (AKA "Big Carl"), the largest land based crane in the world (Or it might be the ALE/Mammoet SK 10000, I need to look that up)

Edited June 7, 2021 by Ben J. Kerman

Granted. Its a off brand lego that makes their bricks with potatoes

I wish for a better GPU

granted. after u bought it, u test it, and it explodes.

i wish for a greenhouse.

Granted, but the plants eat you.

I wish to feel better

Granted.

But everyone around you doesn't feel good and you still have to stay inside bored.

 

I wish for a maid.

granted, but u pay them low and they quit

i wish dinosaurs cannot extinct

Edited June 8, 2021 by JB182

Sure, 50 pterodactyls slam into a crane, causing it to fall on your house.

I wish for more time before bed.

granted, you have more 1 more year before going to bed. but before 1 year, u die bc of not sleeping for a very long time.

i wish kerbals r real

Granted, A Kerbal in a BIG rocket crashed/smashed into your house.

I wish that I didn't need to go to school today.

Granted. You don't. But today your school has a special Cranology Day and all classes are dedicated to it.

I wish to wash the dish.

you washed it, and it explodes.

i wish c-19 diesappear, and no virus appeared after that.

Granted, but bacterial diseases become more common and humanity starts to die off.

I wish for a bowl of cereal

Granted. You go to the cereal bowling.

Bowling pins + glue = this my wish.
